countryRepresentative: If you are a country representative responsible for National Report submission,
nbsapsFull: National Biodiversity Strategies and Action Plans (NBSAPs)
title: Title
tourWelcomeTitle: Welcome to the Online Reporting Tool
tourWelcomeContent: The online reporting tool provides the modality for submitting national targets, as per Annex 1 of decision 15/6
userInfoContent: View and update your profile details.
governmentContent: Country affiliation is required to access submission section of the ORT
rolesContent: Users need National Focal Point, Publishing Authority, or National Authorized User roles to access the submission section.
recentlyPublishedContent: This section displays most recent information
sidebarNavContent: Allows access to all navigation option(s), hide it for extra space (use < icon at the bottom of the section)
languageChangeContent: The ORT is available in all six UN languages, Change to your preferred language.
needHelpContent: Use the Chat feature for additional support.
workflowAlert: The following records require your action or you have requested action.
